entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023
